languages.text: "Хотел бы я знать, какими методами вы и ваши коллеги лечите подобный кадровый голод. Савант... пожалуй, найти такого человека может быть сложнее, чем псайкера".
"I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."
languages.original_text: "Хотел бы я знать, какими методами вы и ваши коллеги лечите подобный кадровый голод. Савант... пожалуй, найти такого человека может быть сложнее, чем псайкера".

traits.locale_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

traits.locale_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

languages.text: “我想知道，你和你的同事会用什么方法来弥补这样的人员缺口，贤者可能比灵能者更加难找。”
languages.original_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

traits.locale_text: “我想知道，你和你的同事会用什么方法来弥补这样的人员缺口，贤者可能比灵能者更加难找。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'aimerais bien savoir comment vos collègues et vous faites pour remédier à une pénurie de personnel pareille. J'imagine que c'est plus difficile de trouver un sage qu'un psyker. »
languages.original_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais bien savoir comment vos collègues et vous faites pour remédier à une pénurie de personnel pareille. J'imagine que c'est plus difficile de trouver un sage qu'un psyker. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Me gustaría saber qué métodos usan sus colegas y usted para resolver la falta de personal de este calibre. Es posible que encontrar a un sabio sea aún más difícil que encontrar a un psíquico».
languages.original_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría saber qué métodos usan sus colegas y usted para resolver la falta de personal de este calibre. Es posible que encontrar a un sabio sea aún más difícil que encontrar a un psíquico».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたとその同僚の方々が、どんな方法でこの人材難に対処するのかお聞かせ願いたい。賢者を探すのは異能者探しより困難でしょう」
languages.original_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたとその同僚の方々が、どんな方法でこの人材難に対処するのかお聞かせ願いたい。賢者を探すのは異能者探しより困難でしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde gerne wissen, welche Methoden Ihr und Eure Kollegen einsetzt, um einen solchen Personalmangel zu beheben. Einen Weisen zu finden, könnte noch schwieriger sein, als einen Psioniker zu finden."
languages.original_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde gerne wissen, welche Methoden Ihr und Eure Kollegen einsetzen, um einen solchen Personalmangel zu beheben. Einen Weisen zu finden, könnte noch schwieriger sein, als einen Psioniker zu finden."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

languages.text: "Personel eksikliğini çözmek için meslektaşlarınla hangi yöntemleri kullandığınızı merak ediyorum. Âlim bulmak, ruhsezer bulmaktan daha zor olabilir."
languages.original_text: "I would like to know what methods you and your colleagues use to remedy such a staffing deficit. Finding a Sage may be more difficult than finding a psyker."

traits.locale_text: "Kadrodaki eksikliği çözmek için meslektaşlarınla hangi yöntemleri kullandığınızı merak ediyorum. Bir Âlim bulmak, ruhsezer bulmaktan daha zor olabilir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
